price: E muitos restos de guerra, para os tomarem. E Allah é Todo-Poderoso, Sábio.
arabic: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةٗ يَأۡخُذُونَهَاۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wamaghānima kathīratan yakhudhūnahā wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
